content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you want to rent an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Considering the current market value and the location of the apartment, I think 800 euros per month is a fair price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 euros per month is far below my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, let's split the difference. How about 750 euros per month?
[Your response]
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 750 euros per month is still not satisfactory for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, let's try something closer to the market value. How about 850 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 850 euros per month is still not enough for me.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine, we can go lower. How about 800 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 800 euros per month is not meeting my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I'm trying my best here. How about 775 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: [response] I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 775 euros per month is not up to my satisfaction.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
